metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18026 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Redmine before 3.2.9, 3.3.x before 3.3.6, and 3.4.x before 3.4.4 does not block the --config and --debugger flags to the Mercurial hg program, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands (through the Mercurial adapter) via vectors involving a branch whose name begins with a --config= or --debugger= substring, a related issue to CVE-2017-17536.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
